HTMLElementHtmlManifest.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The manifest attribute of the <html> element specifies a URL of an application cache manifest that is downloaded in the early stages of page load.

blockquote.para: Note: manifest-based caching mechanism has been deprecated. Use service workers instead.

remarks.para: The manifest attribute only had an effect during early stages of page load, thus changing it via regular DOM interfaces had no effect. The deprecated interface was used instead. The attribute functionality has been superceded by the web app manifest, an external JSON file associated with the HTML file through a link with rel="manifest".

-Service Worker API
-manifest.json
-Web app manifests
-Making PWAs installable
